About this site

Last updated on December 1, 2022 design

This site is a little experiment into writing, Indieweb and digital gardening. You might want to Start here.

Just the facts

This site is made with Jekyll, specifically the Jekyll digital garden theme (with some slight adjustments). It’s published with GitHub and Netlify, don’t ask me how it all works. Fonts are Georgia + Helvetica Neue (if you have it installed, Arial if you don’t). I write notes in Obsidian and use this plugin to publish to my Github. Here’s a bit about My Obsidian workflow.
